mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.order_sn AS orderSn,A.user_id AS userId,A.shop_id AS shopId,A.provider_id AS providerId,A.goods_id AS goodsId,A.goods_number AS goodsNumber,A.coupon_id AS couponId,A.coupon_discount AS couponDiscount,A.shop_price AS shopPrice,A.total_price AS totalPrice,A.order_status_code AS orderStatusCode,A.shipping_status_code AS shippingStatusCode,A.pay_status_code AS payStatusCode,A.order_done_staus_code AS orderDoneStausCode,A.username AS username,A.country AS country,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.district AS district,A.address AS address,A.zipcode AS zipcode,A.phone AS phone,A.tel AS tel,A.email AS email,A.best_time AS bestTime,A.postscript AS postscript,A.shipping_id AS shippingId,A.shipping_name AS shippingName,A.postage_fee AS postageFee,A.express_id AS expressId,A.express_name AS expressName,A.express_code AS expressCode,A.express_order AS expressOrder,A.poll_status AS pollStatus,A.express_status AS expressStatus,A.express_state AS expressState,A.express_json AS expressJson,A.express_receive_time AS expressReceiveTime,A.pay_id AS payId,A.pay_name AS payName,A.how_oos AS howOos,A.scans AS scans,A.hits AS hits,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

,og.shop_price AS shopPrice,g.pic_path AS picPath,og.goods_id AS goodsId,g.shop_id AS shopId ,c.content AS overComment,(og.shop_price*og.goods_number) AS totalMoney,og.goods_attr AS goodsAttr ,og.id AS orderGoodsId,og.goods_type AS goodsType ,s.user_id AS shopUserId,g.goods_name AS goodsName,og.extension_code AS extensionCode , e.brief_name AS expressName,pca.area_name AS cityName,pca1.area_name AS provinceName , s1.name AS shopName,u.username AS nameUser,u.real_name AS userRealName,pr.username AS providerName ,pr.real_name AS providerRealName,co.code AS couponCode

sql.if: AND A.shipping_status_code IN ('shipping_status_todo','shipping_status_done','shipping_status_receive','shipping_status_return') AND A.order_status_code IN ('order_status_todo','order_status_done','order_status_return') AND A.pay_status_code IN ('pay_status_todo','pay_status_ing','pay_status_done')
AND (A.express_state IS NULL OR A.express_state = 0 OR A.express_state = 1 OR A.express_state = 2 OR A.express_state = 5)
AND A.express_state IS NOT NULL AND A.express_state = 3

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN express e ON A.express_id = e.id LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON og.order_id = A.id LEFT JOIN goods_picture gp ON og.goods_id = gp.goods_id AND gp.is_cover = 2 LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = A.goods_id LEFT JOIN comment c ON c.object_id = og.goods_id AND c.comment_type_code = 'comment_order' LEFT JOIN user u ON A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON pca.id = A.city LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON pca1.id = A.province LEFT JOIN provider pr ON pr.id = A.provider_id LEFT JOIN shop s1 ON s1.id = A.shop_id LEFT JOIN coupon co ON co.id = A.coupon_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:

serial, main_status, logic_status, type_id, type_code, deleted_at, deleted_by, group_id, grade_id, dict_code, order_sn, user_id, shop_id, provider_id, goods_id, goods_number, coupon_id, coupon_discount, shop_price, total_price, order_status_code, shipping_status_code, pay_status_code, order_done_staus_code, username, country, province, city, district, address, zipcode, phone, tel, email, best_time, postscript, shipping_id, shipping_name, postage_fee, express_id, express_name, express_code, express_order, poll_status, express_status, express_state, express_json, express_receive_time, pay_id, pay_name, how_oos, scans, hits, link_type, link_id, owner_id, owner_ids, attr_str, attr_str2, attr_int, attr_int2, sequence, remark, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by,
